name: WP Gravity Forms HubSpot
author: CRM Perks.

sections.description:
Gravity Forms HubSpot Add-on automatically sends form submissions to HubSpot when someone submits a form. Learn more at crmperks.com

Gravity Forms HubSpot Add-on Setup

  • Go to Forms -> Settings -> HubSpot then add new account.
  • Go to Forms -> select any form -> Settings -> HubSpot then create new feed.
  • Map required HubSpot fields to Gravity Forms form fields.
  • Send your test entry to HubSpot.
  • Go to Forms -> select any form -> Settings -> HubSpot Logs and verify previously sent entries.

Connect hubspot crm account

Connect any gravity forms to HubSpot account by safe and secure Oauth 2.0 or API Key. Additionally, you can connect multiple hubspot accounts.

Mapping HubSpot fields

Simply select any HubSpot object(Contact, Ticket etc) or hubspot form then map gravity forms form fields to HubSpot object fields.

Manually send entries to HubSpot

Automatically Send gravity forms submissions to HubSpot when user submits form. Also , you can manually send gravity forms submissions to HubSpot.

Filter Gravity Forms HubSpot submissions

Either send all gravity forms entries to HubSpot or filter entries sent to HubSpot based on user input. For example , only send that entry to HubSpot which contains work email address.

Gravity Forms HubSpot logs

View a detailed log of each gravity forms entry whether sent or not sent to HubSpot and easily resend gravity forms entry to HubSpot.

Send Data As HubSpot object Notes

if a contact form has fields which can not be mapped to any HubSpot contact fields, So you can send such fields as HubSpot contact note.

Hubspot Error Reporting

If there is an error while sending an entry to HubSpot, an email containing the error details will be sent to the specified email address.

Create Or Update Contact in HubSpot

If a contact already exists in HubSpot, update it otherwise create a new contact in HubSpot CRM.

Premium Version Features.

Following features are available in premium version Gravity Forms HubSpot Pro.

  • Custom fields, file attachments, custom lists and Phone Number fields.
  • Add HubSpot Contact to Deal, Ticket, Task, Company.
  • Assign a Company to Contact, Ticket, Task.
  • Add Contacts to HubSpot Lists and WorkFlows.
  • Assign a Contact to Ticket or Task.
  • Update deals and tickets in HubSpot.
  • when a user submit a form, you can save gclid, utm parameters and Geo location.
  • Lookup lead’s email and phone number using email or phone number lookup services when user submits a contact form.
  • 20+ premium addons

Need HubSpot Plugin for Woocommerce or Contact Form 7 ?

  • HubSpot Woocommerce Plugin

  • Contact Form 7 HubSpot

Want to send Gravity Forms data to a different crms

We have Premium Gravity Forms add-ons for 20+ CRMs.View All CRM Extensions
sections.faq:
Need free Support?

Our team provides free support at https://www.crmperks.com/contact-us/.

How i can connect gravity forms and HubSpot

Gravity forms is a popular form builder, connecting HubSpot to gravity forms is very easy with this free Gravity Forms HubSpot add-on. Simply Connect HubSpot account then create a feed and map gravity forms fields to HubSpot fields.

Gravity forms HubSpot Integration

You can easily connect Gravity forms and HubSpot with this free plugin. When anyone submits a form, you can add this as a contact in HubSpot.
* Connect HubSpot account to Gravity forms.
* Create a feed then map HubSpot fields to form fields.
* Send Gravity forms entry to HubSpot.

1.1.8

  • fixed “ticket forms” issue.

1.1.7

  • fixed “contacts lists scope missing” issue.

1.1.6

  • fixed “missing scopes” issue.

1.1.5

  • fixed “subscription types” issue.

1.1.4

  • fixed “add to workflow when update is disabled” issue.
  • fixed “hubspot scopes” issue.

1.1.3

  • fixed “html entity in hubspot options” issue.

1.1.2

  • added “search by ID” feature.

1.1.1

  • fixed “token expired” issue.

1.1.0

  • fixed “invalid date exception” issue.

1.0.9

  • fixed “debug xss” issue.

1.0.8

  • fixed “payment completed” feature.

1.0.7

  • fixed “conditional fields in hubspot forms”.

1.0.6

  • fixed “query string with url in hubspot forms”.

1.0.5

  • fixed file upload field in hubspot form.
  • added search deals and tickets feature.

1.0.4

  • added “pipeline” support for deals.
  • fixed “assign company” feature.
  • Do not send spam entries to hubspot.

1.0.3

  • fixed checkbox issue in forms.

1.0.2

  • fixed nothing posted to hubspot issue with API key.

1.0.1

  • Fixed GDPR consent option.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

  2. Map required HubSpot fields.

  3. Gravity Forms HubSpot logs.

  4. Manually Send Gravity Forms entry to HubSpot.

  5. Get Customer's email and phone infomation from Full Contact(Premium feature).

  6. Get visitors's gclid , utm parameters, geolocation, browser and OS (Premium feature).
sections.reviews:
Best Hubspot Plugin

By WeDev.Africa (mad2kx) on October 22, 2023

This plugin is by far the best Hubspot and Gravity Forms connector. Their support is very responsive and helpful.

Responsive Support

By stefk on May 4, 2023

Thanks to the team for responsive support.

Great Support

By WildsideNT on March 29, 2023

Very quick to respond to questions!

Excellent plugin and amazing support

By ahmedwow on May 2, 2022

This plugin makes integrating Gravity forms with HubSpot super easy, it is simple to setup and yet powerful with all the features that our clients need.

Excellent plugin and awesome support

By kereniw on April 12, 2022

Exactly what I was looking for - a plugin to sync form submission data to hubspot easily. Setup was quick and it works seamlessly.

Useful app, quick support

By debbiejic on February 3, 2021

This was really a useful tool for me and my questions were answered really quickly. Thank you.

Robust Plugin and Great Support!

By sackerly on January 1, 2021

I use both the free and premium versions of this plugin, and the integration between GF and Hubspot is excellent! The developer offers quick and excellent support as needed. The plugin is comprehensive and robust. Highly recommend! Update: Continued great support!

Awesome plugin with great support

By auchettl on November 6, 2020

This plugin is brilliant! It really goes deep into the connection between GF and Hubspot, and after trying other plugins 'out there' this is really the only one I found that did everything we needed. There support team was also very quick to respond. Highly recommend this plugin! Many thanks guys

Not bad, not perfect

By nsantana on August 21, 2020

There is no flawless integration for non-Hubspot forms and bugs popup here and there. One example is if you want form entries to be completed with company email domains only i.e. no gmail.com, hotmail.com, etc. you can set that on the form settings such that the form user will receive a notification saying they need to use their work email. The user may abandon the form at that point or try again with a work email, as hoped for, but the form contents are fired to the Hubspot database anyway. So that is an example of a disconnect between what the user is being told and what is going into the Hubspot system. Otherwise, it is mostly turnkey.

Flawless integration and highly helpful, friendly, skilled support

By WEBKINDER (webkinder) on April 1, 2020

We encountered a problem with HubSpot and a non working, misleading filter setting. After creating a new user account for CRM Perks and giving them admin rights to get an inside look at our issue, Sam from CRM Perks knew exactly what to do, worked even during the weekend and solved the problem within a few hours. Thank you Sam!
